id: scenario-value-scanner-student-scenarios-educational-connecting academic learning to care economy values
title: Connecting academic learning to care economy values
description: Connecting academic learning to care economy values
content:
Scenario: Connecting academic learning to care economy values
    Given Kenji studies environmental science
    And his field directly relates to planetary care economy
    When the educational_elohim connects learning to care principles
    Then it should help Kenji see environmental science as care work
    And it should link his academic study to ecological stewardship
    And it should show how his education prepares him for care contributions
    And learning should be framed as developing capacity to serve flourishing
    And the system should integrate academic work with care economy purpose
    And Kenji should understand his education as care economy investment
